fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Stash: If you play 1 or less cards this phase, randomly satchel 1 card in your hand. Does not activate if you already have 5 or more satcheled cards.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Pickpocket: Snatch?! a player. [2 uses, 3 CD]
- Spike: Pick a player. Give them 1 phase of Bleeding/Burning/Poisoned/Cursed for this phase. [4 uses, 1 CD] 
- Reveal: Pick a player. Learn their entire hand with modifiers. [3 uses]
- Swindle: Pick a player. See their entire hand with modifiers. Play up to 2 cards for them. [1 use, Unique]
